thread.section_title: WoodOak Metals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of WoodOak Metals | woodoakmetals.com
thread.title: Danny C.
thread.title_full: WoodOak Metals reviewed by Danny C.

author: Danny C.
title: Danny C.
text: I made a mistake and ordered the wrong gold bars and didn't realize it until it had already shipped... Brad Is a saint!! He helped me through the whole process and I got the bars I wanted and he even gave me free shipping on the second order even though it was my fault. Thank you Brad! Above and Beyond!
